sentences.en: Developments in South Africa receive extensive coverage in The Sunday Telegraph.
sentences.cn: 《星期日电讯报》全面报道了南非的发展。

sentences.en: Giving these events a lot of media coverage merely perpetuates the problem.
sentences.cn: 媒体大量地报道这些事件只会使问题持续下去.

sentences.en: I was disappointed to see the lack of coverage afforded to this event.
sentences.cn: 令我失望的是这一事件并未得到什么报道。

sentences.en: live coverage of the match (= the match is broadcast at the same time that it is happening )
More satellites are needed to provide telephone coverage in remote areas.
sentences.cn: 需要更多的人造衞星覆盖边远地区的电话服务。

sentences.en: Most media coverage disapproves of the travellers' lifestyle and values.
sentences.cn: 大多数媒体报道都不赞成那些旅行者的生活方式和价值观。

sentences.en: Newspapers, television and radio are all providing saturation coverage.
sentences.cn: 报纸、电视和电台全都在铺天盖地地报道。

sentences.en: The coverage of the subject in his botany text is inadequate.
sentences.cn: 他的植物学教科书中对那题目的叙述不充分.

sentences.en: The election was given ample coverage on TV.
sentences.cn: 电视上对选举作了广泛的报道.

sentences.en: The had insisted on a full pictorial coverage of the event.
sentences.cn: 他们坚持要对那一事件做详尽的图片报道.

sentences.en: The measures include tight control of media coverage.
sentences.cn: 那些措施包括对媒体报道的严格管制。
当时媒体的报道糟透了。

sentences.en: The newspapers gave prominent coverage to the news.
sentences.cn: 各报在显著位置上登载了这条消息.

sentences.en: There is a wide spread of stories jostling for coverage on today's front pages.
sentences.cn: 有大量各种题材的报道争着上今天报纸的头版。

sentences.en: This is an insurance policy with extensive coverage.
sentences.cn: 这是一项承保范围广泛的保险.

sentences.en: Under his editorship, the Economist has introduced regular sports coverage.
sentences.cn: 在他担任编辑期间，《经济家》开始定期刊登体育报道。

sentences.en: We've had more press coverage in the last three weeks than in the usual three years.
sentences.cn: 过去的三个星期里，媒体对我们的报道比往常的三年还多。

words.tran_cn: 保护；覆盖；掩护；有夫之妇的法律身分

phrases.tran_cn: 覆盖范围；有效区；作用范围
建蔽率，覆盖率；[经]偿还能力系数
责任保险，责任险承保范围

trans.tran_cn: 新闻报道，信息范围，覆盖范围
trans.tran_en: when a subject or event is reported on television or radio, or in newspapers
